data.question: What is the empirical formula of Co-IPT-IBA?
What is the crystal system of Co-IPT-IBA?
What is the space group of Co-IPT-IBA?
What is the formula weight of Co-IPT-IBA?
What is the iodine adsorption capacity of Co-IPT-IBA?
What is the BET surface area of Co-IPT-IBA?
Does the presence of mesopores contribute to the high iodine adsorption capacity of Co-IPT-IBA?
data.answer: Yes, the presence of mesopores is responsible for the high iodine adsorption capacity.

data.question: Is Co-IPT-IBA stable after iodine adsorption?
data.answer: Yes, the framework of Co-IPT-IBA is stable after iodine adsorption.

data.question: Can Co-IPT-IBA capture methyl iodide vapours?
data.answer: Yes, Co-IPT-IBA can capture methyl iodide vapours with a moderate capacity of 625 mg/g.

data.question: Does the transformation of crystalline Co-IPT-IBA to amorphous MOFs occur due to the methylation reaction?
data.answer: Yes, the transformation to amorphous MOFs may be due to the methylation reaction.

data.question: Is the adsorption of iodine by Co-IPT-IBA reversible?
data.answer: Yes, iodine adsorbed by Co-IPT-IBA can be desorbed by heating the samples at 120 Â°C.

data.question: Does Co-IPT-IBA have a higher iodine adsorption capacity compared to MIL-53-SH(Al)?
Is the BET surface area of Co-IPT-IBA less than 100 m2/g?
Does Co-IPT-IBA have a cubic crystal system?
Is the space group of Co-IPT-IBA P3m1?
Can Co-IPT-IBA be used for the capture of both iodine and methyl iodide vapours?
Is the iodine adsorption capacity of Co-IPT-IBA less than 1 g/g?
Does the presence of mesopores in Co-IPT-IBA decrease its iodine adsorption capacity?
Is the framework of Co-IPT-IBA destroyed after methyl iodide adsorption?
